title: Poland’s SpaceForest Completes Qualification of PERUN Rocket Engine
summary:
Polish rocket builder SpaceForest has completed the final hot fire test of its SF-1000 rocket engine. The company is now preparing for the next test flight of its 11.5-metre suborbital PERUN rocket, which will be powered by the newly qualified engine. The launch is expected before the end of 2025. SpaceForest completed an initial hot […]

title: NASA’s Lunar Trailblazer Moon Mission Ends
summary: The small satellite was to map lunar water, but operators lost contact with the spacecraft the day after launch and were unable to recover the mission. NASA’s Lunar Trailblazer ended its mission to the Moon on July 31. Despite extensive efforts, mission operators were unable to establish two-way communications after losing contact with the spacecraft […]

title: NASA Opens Simulated Mars Habitat to Media Ahead of Second Mission
summary: As NASA prepares for its second year-long Mars simulated mission, media are invited to visit the ground-based habitat where the mission will take place, on Friday, Aug. 22, at the agency’s Johnson Space Center in Houston. title: Marking 13 Years on Mars, NASA’s Curiosity Picks Up New Skills
summary: New capabilities allow the rover to do science with less energy from its batteries. Thirteen years since Curiosity landed on Mars, engineers are finding ways to make the NASA rover even more productive. The six-wheeled robot has been given more autonomy and the ability to multitask — improvements designed to make the most of Curiosity’s […]
